backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: landing page, crop prediction interface, cost calculator, profit calculator, and farmer dashboard with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality across pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color palette for light and dark themes using agricultural earth tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (landing, dashboard, crop prediction, cost calculator, profit calculator, marketplace) wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying FARMAI info, quick links, contact section, and attribution to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component rendering Navigation header, page content via Outlet, and Footer for consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with FARMAI logo, desktop/mobile menus, active route highlighting, and links to all six main pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook providing Internet Identity authentication with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom agricultural-themed color palette (earth tones, forest green, warm brown) for both light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CostCalculatorPage.ts: Page component for calculating cultivation costs with form inputs for crop type, land area, and various expenses (seeds, fertilizers, labor, irrigation, equipment), displaying detailed cost breakdown results.
frontend/src/pages/CropPredictionPage.ts: Page component for AI-powered crop recommendations based on environmental parameters (temperature, humidity, rainfall) and soil conditions (pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium), displaying prediction results.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying farmer metrics (crops managed, profits, listings, recommendations), quick action cards linking to prediction/calculator tools, and recent activity feed.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, problem statement cards highlighting farmer challenges (wrong crop selection, lack of predictions, middleman exploitation), and feature showcase for the FARMAI platform.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Marketplace page for listing and browsing crop sales with search/filter functionality, displaying crop listings with farmer details, and dialog form for adding new listings.
React page component for profit calculation that accepts cultivation cost, yield quantity, and market price inputs, then displays calculated revenue, profit/loss, and profit margin with visual indicators and toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/costCalculations.ts: Utility module that calculates total cultivation costs from itemized inputs (seeds, fertilizers, labor, irrigation, equipment) and returns a breakdown with amounts and percentages for each category.
frontend/src/utils/cropPredictionLogic.t: Contains logic to predict suitable crops (rice, wheat, corn, cotton) based on environmental parameters (temperature, humidity, rainfall, pH, NPK levels) and returns top 3 recommendations with confidence scores and reasons.
frontend/src/utils/profitCalculations.ts: Utility module that calculates revenue, profit, and profit margin from cultivation cost, yield quantity, and market price inputs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting FARMAI as a React-only agriculture platform with features for crop prediction, cost estimation, profit calculation, and marketplace, including architectural notes, image requirements, and existing feature list.
